result.reason: Toolbar position persistence is a minor UX enhancement from 2018 with no implementation path identified; the WinForms ToolStrip layout manager does not persist custom positions by default and retrofitting this requires non-trivial state serialization with high risk of regression.
result.approach: Would require serializing ToolStrip/MenuStrip Dock and location to config on close and restoring on startup; deferred indefinitely given low ROI vs. complexity
